name: lacewing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an insect with large clear wings with thin lines in them: Insects such as lacewings and ladybirds are beneficial for crops. The lacewing has a thin pale green body between two pairs of transparent lace-like wings.
More examplesFewer examplesThere are lacewings, hoverflies, and dragonflies.Invite ladybirds, hoverflies and lacewings into your garden to feed on aphids.Lacewings are natural predators of crop pests and can help the farmer in protecting crops.
